flawed_nl_solution:
If Yola currently weighs 220 pounds, then Wanda, who weighs 30 pounds more than Yola, weighs 220+30 = <<220+30=240>>240 pounds.
Wanda also weighs 80 pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed 240-80=<<240-80=160>>160 pounds 2 years ago.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 240. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
